Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.model.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a player in the model and contains player info and card.
